about_the_game:
◈ Black Mystery: Wujing is A challenging A-RPG and pixel-style lightly casual Rogue-like game inspired by the myth of the Chinese Journey to the West. The story is based on Journey to the West, one of the "Four Great classical novels" of China.

But this time is not the Wukong, you will play Wukong's younger brother "Wujing", in order to save his wife, retracing the West journey, write an NPC adventure epic.

◈ The game places players in a miniature journey west in a parallel universe. Here, you can encounter all kinds of demons and demons. As "Sha Wujing", you need to reach Last Mountain, destroy the demons of every level, and complete the arduous task! Of course, you need to awaken your lost god memories......

◈ There are many combat skills to explore in the game, you will encounter many powerful enemies and opponents, and fight them to the death. Practice a variety of magical spells and item combinations, delve into the experience and discover your favorite skills to Battle and Fight!

Sun Wukong Pigsy white dragon horse together recommended

Sha Wujing, the journey is long, you must closely follow Wukong ah!

Wukong, Master has been captured by a monster.

Wukong, the second brother has been taken by a monster.

Wukong, Master and second brother have been captured by monsters.

Master, don't worry. Big Brother Wukong will come and save us.

The Big Brother Wukong is right: "Play hard and rest well!"

The most nonexistent NPC ever bottomed out!

I am Sha Wujing, the villagers call me Jingjing, I also have my own story!

If there had not been a Master brother Wukong, would you have embarked on the path of enlightenment?

Now that the Master Wukong has come, Jingjing can no longer be quiet.

Ask what LOVE are in the world, and teach people to commit to life and death!

I can't believe that Brother Sha and I are just as crazy for love!

This is the path of a mortal man.

This is an independent game with Sha Wujing as the prototype protagonist.

It is a tale of self-growth, faith and courage.

This story begins with the Quicksand River.....

Baby, add a wish list!

Little brother Sha Wujing, tell your story to everyone!
